name: Devil's Planet Generator
description:
Fantasy tile planet generator. Features:

  • Elevation, biomes, government generation.
  • Elevation generation based on modeling of tectonic plates friction.
  • Biomes creating uses environment data.
  • Governments created using simple history synthesis.
  • Save generated world to disk

Controls: press right mouse button to move camera, F1 - biomes mode, F6 - provinces, F7 - goverments, B - toggle border rendering

Note: to launch game you need a Vulkan compatible video card.
